title: Red Cabbage Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant, bar, and cooking school. Offers a separate ovo-lacto vegetarian menu with opportunities to sample traditional Mexican cooking. The owner, Lola, makes all food here that are not available elsewhere in town. The restaurant is a lively, bohemian space housed in a converted garage. Located 10-minutes walk north from the beach along Calle Cardenas before turning right just as you get to the bridge over the river. Closed September month.
streetAddress: Calle Rivera del Rio 204, Colonia Remance
